title: HOUR 2 - Charlie Weis, Seattle Seahawks
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Charlie Weis, Seattle Seahawks
description:
In hour 2 former Head Coach Charlie Weis joins to talk Rams chemistry with newly added Odell Beckham Jr. What is needed for the Seahawks to rebuild and will it be Russell Wilson or Pete Carroll leaving the organization.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
